raw_body: PERUMAL – HELEN (nee FERNANDOPULLE),​ wife of late Prosper,​ daughter of late Alice & Lewis,​ precious mother of late Godwin and of Eunice & Granville,​ precious sister of Elsie,​ mother-in-law of Dawn & Rohan Casiechitty,​ adored grandmother of Rozelle & Radley,​ Rendl & Avril,​ great grandmother of Jaylen. Cortege leaves residence No. 146,​ New Chetty Street,​ Kotahena on Tuesday,​ 22nd August at 4 p.m. for burial at General Cemetery Kanatte (Roman Catholic Section).052528
